title: 2936 Power button not working
message: I have a 2936-a that self-powers on when plugged in and seem to work ok but it won't power on via the keyboards power button. The power on pads work fine. There was spotty liquid damage and I replaced all the components that looked damaged but still have the exact same results. keyboard connector looks perfect. and I already tried 3 keyboards.

title: 2936 Power button not working
message: Check voltage on both sides of R5710 with power button pressed.
